title.text: Pollution sources on the Kingston waterfront

marker.label: Belle Park leaching landfill
marker.comment: The City of Kingston's notorious leaching dump. The City of Kingston delayed remedial action on this between 1998 and 2005 by appealing all the way to the Supreme Court of Canada before the City's case was summarily tossed.

marker.label: City of Kingston overflow sewage discharge
marker.comment: Over the years, the City of Kingston has dumped hundreds of millions, probably billions, of litres of untreated overflow sewage into the Great Cataraqui River.

marker.label: City of Kingston West water pollution control plant
Canadian Forces Base Area Support Unit Kingston
